feed.title: Ghost Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Ghost: 5.120.4
entry.content:
• 🐛 Fix portal interpolation errors. (#23570) - Cathy Sarisky

View the changelog for full details: https://github.com/tryghost/ghost/compare/v5.120.3...v5.120.4

entry.title: New release for Ghost: 5.121.0
entry.content:
• ✨ Added member export perms to backup integration (#23589) - Hannah Wolfe
  • ✨ Changed staff token perms to match user auth (#23585) - Hannah Wolfe
  • 🐛 Fix portal interpolation errors. (#23570) - Cathy Sarisky
  • 🐛 Fixed preview rendering when member status is not specified (#23529) - Chris Raible
  • 🌐 Updated Bulgarian translations for Portal, Ghost, and Signup form (#23515) - Yovko Lambrev
  • 🌐 Updated Vietnamese translations for Comments, Ghost, and Portal (#23508) - Hannah Le

View the changelog for full details: https://github.com/tryghost/ghost/compare/v5.120.4...v5.121.0

entry.title: New release for Ghost: 5.123.0
entry.content:
• 🐛 Fixed member filter breaking on UI if accessed before required data has loaded (#23667) - Princi Vershwal
  • 🐛 Fixed wrong unsubscribe link in comment notification mail (#23604) - Sebastian Schröder
  • 🐛 Fixed previews for tier gated posts (#23531) - Chris Raible

View the changelog for full details: https://github.com/tryghost/ghost/compare/v5.121.0...v5.123.0

entry.title: New release for Ghost: 5.125.0
entry.content:
This release contains fixes for minor bugs and issues reported by Ghost users.

View the changelog for full details: https://github.com/tryghost/ghost/compare/v5.123.0...v5.125.0

entry.title: New release for Ghost: 5.125.1
entry.content:
• 🐛 Fixed misleading column name in post analytics links table - Kevin Ansfield
  • 🐛 Fixed integrations not being visible when count > 11 - Kevin Ansfield
  • 🌐 Updated Spanish translations for Ghost, Comments, Portal, and Sign-up (#23524) - Eduardo Puente
  • 🌐 Added i18n support for comments mails (#23602) - Sebastian Schröder

View the changelog for full details: https://github.com/tryghost/ghost/compare/v5.125.0...v5.125.1
